duties_responsibilities.duty: Running a daily route resolving customer pest concerns and issues
Maintaining truck and equipment in proper working order
Keeping accurate records of treatments provided
Mixing, applying, and working with pesticides following state and federal laws
Serve as the subject matter expert for customers, implementing efficient pest solutions
Maintain and service all route customers according to company standards
Keep management informed of any problems encountered on service routes
Maintain proper inventory of pesticides in usage

education_certification.credential: US driver’s license valid for a minimum of 4 years
